SearchController - Class in client.view.search
Controller, responsible for users searching for server operations.
SearchController() - Constructor for class client.view.search.SearchController
 
Seeker - Class in client.model
Sends Multicast packets to specific multicast group so, the server could recognize, at which IP the client is located.
Seeker() - Constructor for class client.model.Seeker
 
sendMessage(DataOutputStream, String) - Static method in class client.model.Client
 
server - package server
Provides server related classes.
Server - Class in server.model
Chat's server class.
Server(String, String) - Constructor for class server.model.Server
 
server.model - package server.model
Provides server backend classes.
server.view - package server.view
Provides server frontend classes and resources, grouped in subpackages.
server.view.create - package server.view.create
 
SERVER_FINAL_PORT - Static variable in class server.model.ServerConstants
This port is used by client and server to establish connection with each other.
SERVER_MULTI_PORT - Static variable in class server.model.ServerConstants
Port, on which client sends multicast packets and server listens for them in order, for them to find each other.
SERVER_STRING - Static variable in class server.model.ServerConstants
String, that Seeker and ClientNotifier are using to identify, that datagrams, which they receive belongs to each other.
serverAddress - Static variable in class client.model.Client
 
ServerConstants - Class in server.model
Static class, containing ancillary fields and methods for use by other program classes.
ServerConstants() - Constructor for class server.model.ServerConstants
Deprecated.
No replacement.
serverSocket - Variable in class server.model.ClientConnector
A server socket for establishing final connection with client
setNickname(String) - Method in class server.model.ClientHandler
Establishes client's nickname field (ClientHandler.nickname) and prevents client's nicknames from repeating.

SLServer - Static variable in class main.SLChat

socket - Variable in class client.model.Client

startListening() - Method in class server.model.Server
Starts threads, which notify clients about server's presence, connect clients and handle those connections.
